page.title: 18Health and Social Amenities
page.content:
Draycott in the Clay is at least 6 miles from any of the nearby towns, which means that life saving services can be 15 minutes away, however the pleasures of living in the country outweigh such worries for most people.
The area is very fortunate to have an excellent doctors' group practice based at Sudbury.
Also at Sudbury there is an open prison from which many prisoners have absconded, however very few villagers are worried about this.
There is a bus service to and from Burton and Uttoxeter 4 or 5 times a day; and once a fortnight a mobile library parks in the village for half an hour.
